analysis.key_quote: This is an awful idea and spits in the face of the Pendleton civil service act, forcing the federal govt back to the spoils system and increasing power to the president, which makes us less of a democracy.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by referencing the Pendleton civil service act and expressing concerns about a return to the spoils system, which indicates a defense of merit-based systems and a fear of politicization.
